Package org.anchoranalysis.plugin.quick.bean.structure

Class ExperimentStructure

Object
AnchorBean<PathPrefixer>
PathPrefixer
ExperimentStructure
public class ExperimentStructure
extends PathPrefixer
A file path prefixer that combines a prefix with an experimentType

A convenience method for commonly used prefixer settings when the output occurs in an experiment/$1/ filesystem structure where $1 is the experimentType
